ai-patthana23.12:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.12:0.3_0: I am worth a sixteenth part
ai-patthana23.12:1.1_0: Not with an unwholesome mental object, no cause or condition. Consciousness arises dependent on the teaching,
ai-patthana23.12:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.12:2.1_0: It’s not unskillful, with a reason to give rise to skillful qualities, conditions, and with the have a reason.
ai-patthana23.12:3.1_0: or unwholesome thoughts, newly ordainedness, or a condition.
